definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: So this kind of anesthesia method is applicable completely to the policlinic induced abortion operations.
sentences.chinese: 所以這種麻醉方法適用於門診人工流產手術。

sentences.english: Adnexitis happen often after delivery or execute abortion in postoperative.
sentences.chinese: 附件炎的發生往往在分娩後或在施行人工流產術後。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the analgesic effect of diprovan and tramadol in induced abortion.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察異丙酚與曲嗎多在人工流產中的應用效果。

sentences.english: The doctor reminded that induced abortions must be considered carefully for nulliparas.
sentences.chinese: 醫生提醒說，未生育者一定要慎行人工流產。

sentences.english: Many women who have abortions are extremely uneasy about their decision.
sentences.chinese: 許多女性對於人工流產決定表現及其不安。

sentences.english: Ultrasound and the future of abortion.
sentences.chinese: 超聲和未來的人工流產。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the anesthetic effect of nitrous oxide and intravenous anesthesia in induced abortion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討笑氣與靜脈麻醉對人工流產術的手術效果。

sentences.english: Objective To research the analgesia of laughing gas in induced abortion.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究笑氣在人工流產術中的鎮痛作用。

sentences.english: If your uterus is perforated, your urinary bladder can be perforated, too.
sentences.chinese: 如果人工流產過程中子宮穿孔的話，膀胱也會穿孔。

sentences.english: Adnexitis's occurrence often after the childbirth or after execution induced abortion technique.
sentences.chinese: 附件炎的發生往往在分娩後或在施行人工流產術後。

sentences.english: About 10% of pregnancies in Oklahoma end in induced abortions.
sentences.chinese: 俄克拉荷馬州10%妊娠止於人工流產。

sentences.english: Frequently after an abortion, women suffer a range of mental and psychological problems.
sentences.chinese: 通常在人工流產後，女性會有一些精神和心理的問題。
人工流產是否合法容易？

sentences.english: Today, unwanted pregnancies can be prevented with almost complete certainty.
sentences.chinese: 目的在於預防非意願妊娠的發生，以降低人工流產率。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the hemostasis of oxytocin by intravenous injection in artificial abortion.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察在人工流產術中靜脈推注縮宮素的止血效果。

sentences.english: This article reviews these in order to prevent the happening of no willingness pregnancy and reduce the rate of induced abortion.
sentences.chinese: 目的在於預防非意願妊娠的發生，以降低人工流產率。

definition: medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
to dismiss with severance pay/to pay sb off
to restore sth to its original state
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
